definition: telomere, a protective DNA cap on a chromosome
end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: Leukocyte telomere length (LTL) reflects not only chronologic age but also the burden of disease. We hypothesized that LTL would be decreased in children with OSA.
sentences.chinese: 白細胞端粒長度不僅反映年齡變化而且反映疾病負擔。

sentences.english: It indicates that telomerase participates in the repair process of DNA injury induced by ionizing radiation.
sentences.chinese: 推測端粒酶參與電離輻射誘導DNA損傷的修復。

sentences.english: Telomerase is an enzyme that can rebuild and lengthen telomeres.
sentences.chinese: 端粒末端轉移酶是一種可以重建並且延展端粒的酶。

sentences.english: Telomerase is an enzyme that can rebuild and lengthen telomeres.
sentences.chinese: 端粒末端轉移酶是一種可以重建並且延展端粒的酶。

sentences.english: This is the role of structures called telomeres that cap the ends of chromosomes.
sentences.chinese: 這就是蓋住染色體各端的端粒結構的功能。

sentences.english: G- quadruplex is a special structure formed by telomere.
sentences.chinese: 四聯體是端粒形成的一種特殊的結構。

sentences.english: If the telomeres are shortened, cells age.
sentences.chinese: 當端粒變短的時候，細胞就開始老化。

sentences.english: Telomerase is the enzyme that builds telomeres.
sentences.chinese: 而端粒酶顧名思義，就是生成端粒的那種酶。

sentences.english: Telomerase is the enzyme that builds telomeres.
sentences.chinese: 而端粒酶顧名思義，就是生成端粒的那種酶。

sentences.english: Our second chromosome has telomere DNA at the center.
sentences.chinese: 我們的第2條染色體在中心部位含有端粒DNA。

sentences.english: Role of hTERT in apoptosis of cervical cancer induced by histone deacetylase inhibitor.
sentences.chinese: 人端粒酶逆轉錄酶在宮頸癌組織中的表達及意義。

sentences.english: Inhibition of telomerase activity leads the cells to senescence and death.
sentences.chinese: 端粒酶活性的抑制可以導致細胞的衰老和死亡。

sentences.english: Telomereshelp preserve DNA stability in cells by containing genetic miscues.
sentences.chinese: 端粒能幫助維持細胞DNA的穩定性。

sentences.english: Scientists have yet to study whether telomeres influence a person's appearance.
sentences.chinese: 科學家還將研究端粒是否會影響人的外表。

sentences.english: Greider explained that, when cells divide, a little material gets sheared off the ends of the chromosomes.
sentences.chinese: 格蕾德告訴我們，細胞分裂時染色體端粒會發生降解。

sentences.english: That's why telomeres are present at the ends of DNA strands.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼端粒出現在每一串DNA的端部。

pinyin: tuo1 yang3 he2 tang2 he2 suan1
